penny.description: User-friendly AI chat and workbench platform for consumers and enterprises. Your intelligent assistant for everyday tasks and business automation.
penny.audience: Consumers and businesses of all sizes

cotizaStudio.description: Intelligent quotation and budgeting system with complete sales process automation.

forgeSight.description: Enterprise-grade pricing intelligence platform that continuously harvests, normalizes, and benchmarks prices across the global digital fabrication industry.
forgeSight.audience: Digital fabrication companies, 3D printing services, and procurement teams

features.0: AI-powered price discovery from 1000+ vendors globally
features.1: Real-time statistical benchmarking (p10/p50/p90) by material and region
features.2: Enterprise security with OAuth2/JWT and comprehensive audit trails

dhanam.description: Financial wellness and wealth management platform with AI-powered insights.

avala.description: SaaS platform for designing, delivering, and verifying competency-based training aligned with Mexican EC/CONOCER standards. Generates DC-3 certificates and ensures regulatory compliance.
avala.audience: Training organizations and enterprises in LATAM

features.1: DC-3 certificate generation and SIRCE compliance

factlas.description: Geographic intelligence platform that converts geospatial signals into auditable facts with coordinates. STAC-compliant catalog for discovering and analyzing location data.
factlas.audience: Real estate developers, urban planners, and GIS analysts

features.2: AI-powered site selection and change detection
